languages.text: {n}Вокс техножреца задумчиво шипит:{/n} "Вот почему Знание должно оставаться лишь в руках достойных. Многие миряне способны овладеть им, но многомудрый разум, не скованный обетами послушания Омниссии, уязвим для скверны и вольнодумства. Уязвим сильнее, чем разум несведущего простолюдина".

{n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс техножреца задумчиво шипит:{/n} "Вот почему Знание должно оставаться лишь в руках достойных. Многие миряне способны овладеть им, но многомудрый разум, не скованный обетами послушания Омниссии, уязвим для скверны и вольнодумства. Уязвим сильнее, чем разум несведущего простолюдина".

Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

{n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了深思的嘶嘶声。{/n}“看，这就是为什么知识必须掌握在有价值的人手中。许多普通人都有能力获得知识，但他们的聪慧头脑并没有被欧姆尼塞亚的誓言所束缚，很容易受到腐化与自由思想的影响，甚至比无知平民的头脑更容易受到伤害。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的音阵系统发出了深思的嘶嘶声。{/n}“看，这就是为什么知识必须掌握在有价值的人手中。许多普通人都有能力获得知识，但他们的聪慧头脑并没有被欧姆尼塞亚的誓言所束缚，很容易受到腐化与自由思想的影响，甚至比无知平民的头脑更容易受到伤害。”

languages.text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un siseo pensativo:{/n} «Aquí tenemos la prueba de por qué el conocimiento debe permanecer en manos de los dignos. Aunque muchos laicos pueden poseerlo, una mente sabia que no esté atada por juramentos de obediencia al Omnissiah es vulnerable a la corrupción y a la libertad de pensamiento. Más vulnerable aún que la mente de un campesino ignorante».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco de Pasqal emite un siseo pensativo:{/n} «Aquí tenemos la prueba de por qué el conocimiento debe permanecer en manos de los dignos. Aunque muchos laicos pueden poseerlo, una mente sabia que no esté atada por juramentos de obediencia al Omnissiah es vulnerable a la corrupción y a la libertad de pensamiento. Más vulnerable aún que la mente de un campesino ignorante».

languages.text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが考え込むかのようにシューッと音を出す。{/n}「見よ、知識は傑物の手に収めておかなくてはならない理由の証左なり。所有できる一般人は数多くいても、万機神への服従の誓いで縛られていない賢しらな精神は腐敗と自由思想の影響に弱い。無知な一般市民の精神より、はるかに脆いものです」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルのヴォクスが考え込むかのようにシューッと音を出す。{/n}「見よ、知識は傑物の手に収めておかなくてはならない理由の証左なり。所有できる一般人は数多くいても、万機神への服従の誓いで縛られていない賢しらな精神は腐敗と自由思想の影響に弱い。無知な一般市民の精神より、はるかに脆いものです」

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Vox gibt ein nachdenkliches Zischen von sich:{/n} "Seht diesen Beweis, warum Wissen in den Händen der Würdigen verbleiben muss. Viele Laien können es besitzen, aber ein kluger Geist, der durch keinen Schwur des Gehorsams an den Omnissiah gebunden ist, ist durch Korruption und Freidenkertum angreifbar. Angreifbarer sogar als der Geist unwissender einfacher Bürger."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Vox gibt ein nachdenkliches Zischen von sich:{/n} "Seht diesen Beweis, warum Wissen in den Händen der Würdigen verbleiben muss. Viele Laien können es besitzen, aber ein kluger Geist, der durch keinen Schwur des Gehorsams an den Omnissiah gebunden ist, ist durch Korruption und Freidenkertum angreifbar. Angreifbarer sogar als der Geist unwissender einfacher Bürger."

languages.text: {n}Un sifflement pensif sort du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Voilà précisément pourquoi la connaissance doit être réservée à ceux qui en sont dignes. Beaucoup de profanes sont capables de la posséder, mais un sage qui n'a pas juré obéissance à l'Omnimessie est vulnérable à la corruption et à la libre pensée, plus encore qu'un ignorant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un sifflement pensif sort du vox de Pasqal.{/n} « Voilà précisément pourquoi la connaissance doit être réservée à ceux qui en sont dignes. Beaucoup de profanes sont capables de la posséder, mais un sage qui n'a pas juré obéissance à l'Omnimessie est vulnérable à la corruption et à la libre pensée, plus encore qu'un ignorant. »

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, endişeli bir tıslama yayıyor.{/n} "İşte, İrfanın neden yalnızca ona layıklara mahsus olması gerektiğinin kanıtı. Pek çok avam, İrfana kadir olabilir. Lakin Hermesih'e itaat yemini etmemiş bilge bir zihin, yozlaşma ve hür düşünceye karşı savunmasızdır. Cahil bir köylününkünden bile daha savunmasız..."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's vox emits a pensive hiss:{/n} "Behold, proof of why Knowledge must remain in the hands of the worthy. Many laypeople are capable of possessing it, but a wise mind that is not bound by oaths of obedience to the Omnissiah is vulnerable to corruption and freethinking. Even more vulnerable than the mind of an ignorant commoner."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, endişeli bir tıslama yayıyor.{/n} "İşte, İrfanın neden yalnızca ona layıklara mahsus olması gerektiğinin kanıtı. Pek çok avam, İrfan'a kadir olabilir. Lakin Hermesih'e itaat yemini etmemiş bilge bir zihin, yozlaşma ve hür düşünceye karşı savunmasızdır. Cahil bir köylününkünden bile daha savunmasız..."
